name: rss-item-recorder
description: record rss items from davereader to sqlite-db using event emitter

scripts.start:dev: npm run eslint && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev node --inspect src/index.js
scripts.start:prod: npm run eslint && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod node dist/index.js
scripts.start:heroku: npm run eslint && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node dist/index.js

author: sankemax
